title: Current Opportunities to Support Frontier Science at the Human Nature Lab
description: Here you will find information about our latest ideas, many of which are in need of financial support in order to move from the planning stages to reality. Our team would welcome the chance to tell you more about our work in person, and to explore how our work can advance your own philanthropic interests.  Please email Nicholas Christakis here, if you would like to schedule a talk or in-person presentation about any of these giving opportunities.
contactMessage: Contact us to support this project or for more information
